philosophyText1: Welcome to Parco dei Grani, an oasis of flavor and relaxation in the heart of Rimini. Located at Via Giovanni Lanza 9, our venue was created with the idea of offering an authentic and friendly culinary experience, surrounded by greenery and designed for the whole family.
philosophyText2: The large outdoor area with a playground makes Parco dei Grani the perfect place for families with children, as well as for those looking for a relaxed and welcoming atmosphere. We offer on-site parking and outdoor seating.
